title: BARD - It's Open Season
itunes:title: BARD - It's Open Season
description:
Mark joins Adam via zoom from San Jose, CA where he is working on Cain Velasquez's case and they dive into the recent verdict in the case of four would be kidnappers of Michigan Governor Gretchen Whitmer.

Watch Beyond A Reasonable Doubt on YouTube at YouTube.com/ReasonableDoubtPodcast and subscribe while you're there.
